SENT.plain: Based on 2130 autopsies with a hypertension it is reported on the hypertensive CNS-lesions
The relapse rate of haemorrhages was about 5%
The encephalomalacia existed by way of secondary finding in 24.7%, and the haemorrhage in 2.2%
The investigations showed an important arteriosclerosis by 39.8% in haemorrhages and by 51.6% in brain infarct
It was remarkable by the hypertensive brain haemorrhages a dominant right hemisphere
